Name: SUA
About the game: SUA is a rather dark adventure game. The game was created by the RPG maker's music video. The game was fictionized based on the history that took place on March 1, 1919, referring to South Korea history. As we solve puzzles and escape, we meet and learn stories from various people. In order to show how many people have worked hard in South Korea in the past through this game, Find hidden hints and many heroes who worked hard to help South Korea. In a different world, Sua went on an adventure with the guardian deity, Beom, and solved a lot of things she met there. I saw the painful reality that they had to go through and the effort to get out of it. I think there will be difficulties in encountering neutral or hostile characters. Solve difficulties with friends you met in a different world, listen to them and learn a lot about their experiences. I will try to return to the world where Sua lived while remembering them. Everyone, try to escape with the girl. You will see the world with the eyes of a third person. You will understand the story. Synopsis Sua, who ended up working in Gyeongseong, moved to a cruel world because of an incident, where she met the guardian deity Beom.We start traveling together to escape there.
